name: walrus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mammal that lives in the sea and on beaches in the Arctic. It is similar to a seal but larger, with two tusks and long hairs growing near its mouth.
mikeojohnson photography - mojphopto.com/Moment/GettyImages

a sea mammal, similar to a seal (= a large, fish-eating animal) but larger and with two very long teeth that stick out from the mouth
